name: War Tanks
description: Control the tank and destroy all the enemies. Monitor the condition of the tank's armor and fuel. You can increase the rate of fire of the tank by 3 times. You will find the corresponding elements on the battlefield. The number of remaining targets is indicated on the screen. You can control the keyboard and mouse. After destroying all the enemies, you need to cross the finish line to complete the level. You can switch between three views: First-person camera, third-person and top view.
